Contacts

Search Contacts

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

contacts

/

search

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/contacts/search \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

Copy

```
{
  "meta": {
    "count": 123,
    "current_page": "<string>"
  },
  "payload": [\
    {\
      "additional_attributes": {\
        "city": "<string>",\
        "country": "<string>",\
        "country_code": "<string>",\
        "created_at_ip": "<string>"\
      },\
      "availability_status": "online",\
      "email": "<string>",\
      "id": 123,\
      "name": "<string>",\
      "phone_number": "<string>",\
      "blocked": true,\
      "identifier": "<string>",\
      "thumbnail": "<string>",\
      "custom_attributes": {},\
      "last_activity_at": 123,\
      "created_at": 123,\
      "contact_inboxes": [\
        {\
          "source_id": "<string>",\
          "inbox": {\
            "id": 123,\
            "avatar_url": "<string>",\
            "channel_id": 123,\
            "name": "<string>",\
            "channel_type": "<string>",\
            "provider": "<string>"\
          }\
        }\
      ]\
    }\
  ]
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

#### Query Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#parameter-q)

q

string

Search using contact `name`, `identifier`, `email` or `phone number`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#parameter-sort)

sort

enum<string>

The attribute by which list should be sorted

Available options:

`name`,

`email`,

`phone_number`,

`last_activity_at`,

`-name`,

`-email`,

`-phone_number`,

`-last_activity_at`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#parameter-page)

page

integer

default:1

The page parameter

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-meta)

meta

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-meta-count)

meta.count

integer

Total number of contacts

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-meta-current-page)

meta.current\_page

string

Current page number

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-payload)

payload

object\[\]

List of contacts

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-additional-attributes)

additional\_attributes

object

The object containing additional attributes related to the contact

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-additional-attributes-city)

additional\_attributes.city

string

City of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-additional-attributes-country)

additional\_attributes.country

string

Country of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-additional-attributes-country-code)

additional\_attributes.country\_code

string

Country code of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-additional-attributes-created-at-ip)

additional\_attributes.created\_at\_ip

string

IP address when the contact was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-availability-status)

availability\_status

enum<string>

Availability status of the contact

Available options:

`online`,

`offline`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-email)

email

string \| null

The email address of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-id)

id

integer

The ID of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-name)

name

string

The name of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-phone-number)

phone\_number

string \| null

The phone number of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-blocked)

blocked

boolean

Whether the contact is blocked

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-identifier)

identifier

string \| null

The identifier of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-custom-attributes)

custom\_attributes

object

The custom attributes of the contact

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-last-activity-at)

last\_activity\_at

integer \| null

Timestamp of last activity

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-created-at)

created\_at

integer

Timestamp when contact was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-contact-inboxes)

contact\_inboxes

object\[\]

List of inboxes associated with this contact

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-source-id)

source\_id

string

Source identifier for the contact inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox)

inbox

object

Show child attributes

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox-id)

inbox.id

integer

ID of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox-avatar-url)

inbox.avatar\_url

string

URL for the inbox avatar

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox-channel-id)

inbox.channel\_id

integer

ID of the channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox-name)

inbox.name

string

Name of the inbox

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox-channel-type)

inbox.channel\_type

string

Type of channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/contacts/search-contacts#response-inbox-provider)

inbox.provider

string \| null

Provider of the inbox

Assistant

Responses are generated using AI and may contain mistakes.

metadata.og:title: Search Contacts - Chatwoot Developer Docs
metadata.og:description: Search the resolved contacts using a search key, currently supports email search (Page size = 15). Resolved contacts are the ones with a value for identifier, email or phone number
